channel.title: Scripting killer notes
channel.description:
With the ability to draw on the killer notes, I feel compelled to draw detailed drawings on them. I've had fun in the past doing so on sites like isketch. Before I attempt that I want to confirm whether or not that is safe to do in game. I am unaware of any anti cheat detection in Throne of Lies.
Will I be banned for automating my point and clicks on the killer note screen in Throne of Lies?
